name: Gears of War: Ultimate Edition and Rare Replay
summary:
Original Gears of War is remastered in 1080P and modernized for Xbox One including support for 7.1 Surround Sound, Includes new content including five campaign chapters never released on Xbox. Celebrate Rare's 30th Anniversary with a jaw-dropping collection of 30 iconic games, lovingly presented for Xbox One
10,000 Gamerscore points available and 700+ hours of gameplay. Tackle snapshot challenges and enjoy exclusive bonus features
